entry.title: 计蒜客-K Sum(积性函数+杜教筛)
entry.content:
The Preliminary Contest for ICPC Asia Nanjing 2019

题目描述

fn(k)=∑l1=1n∑l2=1n...∑lk=1n(gcd(l1,l2,...,lk))2f_n(k)=\sum_{l_1=1}^n\sum_{l_2=1}^n...\sum_{l_k=1}^n(gcd(l_1,l_2,...,l_k))^2fn​(k)=l1​=1∑n​l2​=1∑n​...lk​=1∑n​(gcd(l1​,l2​,...,lk​))2

Given n(1≤n≤109),k(2≤k≤10105)n(1\leq n \leq 10^9), k(2\leq k \leq 10^{10^5})n(1≤n≤109),k(2≤k≤10105), please calculate

∑i=2kfn(i)(mod109+7)\sum_{i=2}^k f_n(i) \pmod {10^9+7}i=2∑k​fn​(i)(mod109+7)

解题思路

fn(k)=∑l1=1n∑l2=1n...∑lk=1n(gcd(l1,l2,...,lk))2=∑i=1n∑l1=1n∑l2=1n...∑lk=1ni2[gcd(l1,l2,...,lk)==i]=∑i=1ni2∑l1=1n/i∑l2=1n/i...∑lk=1n/i[gcd(l1,l2,...,lk)==1]=∑i=1ni2∑d=1n/iμ(d)∑l1=1n/id∑l2=1n/id...∑lk=1n/id1=∑i=1ni2∑d=1n/iμ(d)(nid)k=∑l=1n(nl)k∑d∣lμ(d)(ld)2f_n(k)=\sum_{l_1=1}^n\sum_{l_2=1}^n...\sum_{l_k=1}^n (gcd(l_1,l_2,...,l_k))^2 \\=\sum_{i=1}^n\sum_{l_1=1}^n\sum_{l_2=1}^n...\sum_{l_k=1}^n i^2[gcd(l_1,l_2,...,l_k)==i] \\=\sum_{i=1}^n i^2 \sum_{l_1=1}^{n/i}\sum_{l_2=1}^{n/i}...\sum_{l_k=1}^{n/i} [gcd(l_1,l_2,...,l_k)==1] \\=\sum_{i=1}^n i^2 \sum_{d=1}^{n/i} \mu(d)\sum_{l_1=1}^{n/id}\sum_{l_2=1}^{n/id}...\sum_{l_k=1}^{n/id} 1 \\=\sum_{i=1}^n i^2 \sum_{d=1}^{n/i} \mu(d) (\frac{n}{id})^k \\=\sum_{l=1}^n (\frac{n}{l})^k \sum_{d|l} \mu(d) (\frac{l}{d})^2fn​(k)=l1​=1∑n​l2​=1∑n​...lk​=1∑n​(gcd(l1​,l2​,...,lk​))2=i=1∑n​l1​=1∑n​l2​=1∑n​...lk​=1∑n​i2[gcd(l1​,l2​,...,lk​)==i]=i=1∑n​i2l1​=1∑n/i​l2​=1∑n/i​...lk​=1∑n/i​[gcd(l1​,l2​,...,lk​)==1]=i=1∑n​i2d=1∑n/i​μ(d)l1​=1∑n/id​l2​=1∑n/id​...lk​=1∑n/id​1=i=1∑n​i2d=1∑n/i​μ(d)(idn​)k=l=1∑n​(ln​)kd∣l∑​μ(d)(dl​)2

∑i=2kfn(i)=∑i=2k∑l=1n(nl)i∑d∣lμ(d)(ld)2=∑l=1n(∑i=2k(nl)i)∑d∣lμ(d)(ld)2=∑l=1n(∑i=2kqi)∑d∣lμ(d)(ld)2\sum_{i=2}^k f_n(i)=\sum_{i=2}^k\sum_{l=1}^n (\frac{n}{l})^i \sum_{d|l} \mu(d) (\frac{l}{d})^2 \\=\sum_{l=1}^n(\sum_{i=2}^k (\frac{n}{l})^i) \sum_{d|l} \mu(d) (\frac{l}{d})^2 \\=\sum_{l=1}^n(\sum_{i=2}^k q^i) \sum_{d|l} \mu(d) (\frac{l}{d})^2 \\i=2∑k​fn​(i)=i=2∑k​l=1∑n​(ln​)id∣l∑​μ(d)(dl​)2=l=1∑n​(i=2∑k​(ln​)i)d∣l∑​μ(d)(dl​)2=l=1∑n​(i=2∑k​qi)d∣l∑​μ(d)(dl​)2

前面那部分等比数列求和，外面整体分块，所以要求后面的前缀和S(n)S(n)S(n)，后面记为g(l)=∑d∣lμ(d)(ld)2g(l)=\sum_{d|l} \mu(d) (\frac{l}{d})^2g(l)=∑d∣l​μ(d)(dl​)2，则

g(l)=(μ∗Id2)(l)g(l)=(\mu * Id^2)(l)g(l)=(μ∗Id2)(l)

h(l)=(g∗I)(l)=(μ∗Id2∗I)(l)=Id2(l)h(l)=(g*I)(l)=(\mu * Id^2 * I)(l)=Id^2(l)h(l)=(g∗I)(l)=(μ∗Id2∗I)(l)=Id2(l)

∑i=1nh(i)=∑i=1n∑d∣iI(d)g(id)=∑d=1nI(d)∑i=1n/dg(i)=∑d=1nI(d)S(n/d)=S(n)−∑d=2nS(n/d)\sum_{i=1}^n h(i)=\sum_{i=1}^n\sum_{d|i} I(d)g(\frac{i}{d}) \\=\sum_{d=1}^n I(d) \sum_{i=1}^{n/d} g(i) \\=\sum_{d=1}^n I(d) S(n/d) \\=S(n)-\sum_{d=2}^n S(n/d)i=1∑n​h(i)=i=1∑n​d∣i∑​I(d)g(di​)=d=1∑n​I(d)i=1∑n/d​g(i)=d=1∑n​I(d)S(n/d)=S(n)−d=2∑n​S(n/d)

∑i=1nh(i)=12+22+...+n2=n(n+1)(2n+1)6\sum_{i=1}^n h(i)=1^2+2^2+...+n^2=\frac{n(n+1)(2n+1)}{6}i=1∑n​h(i)=12+22+...+n2=6n(n+1)(2n+1)​

S(n)=n(n+1)(2n+1)6−∑d=2nS(n/d)S(n)=\frac{n(n+1)(2n+1)}{6}-\sum_{d=2}^n S(n/d)S(n)=6n(n+1)(2n+1)​−d=2∑n​S(n/d)

线形筛部分

S(n)=∑d∣lμ(d)(ld)2S(1)=1,S(p)=p2−1,S(pk)=p2k−2(p2−1)if(i%p==0),S(ip)=S(i)S(p)if(i%p!=0),S(ip)=S(i/pa1)S(pa1+1),S(i)=S(i/pa1)S(pa1)S(pa1+1)=p2(a1+1)−2(p2−1)=[p2a1−2(p2−1)]p2=S(pa1)p2S(ip)=S(i)p2S(n)=\sum_{d|l} \mu(d)(\frac{l}{d})^2 \\S(1)=1,S(p)=p^2-1,S(p^k)=p^{2k-2}(p^2-1) \\if (i\%p==0),S(ip)=S(i)S(p) \\if (i\%p!=0),S(ip)=S(i/p^{a_1})S(p^{a_1+1}),S(i)=S(i/p^{a_1})S(p^{a_1}) \\S(p^{a_1+1})=p^{2(a_1+1)-2}(p^2-1)=[p^{2a_1-2}(p^2-1)]p^2=S(p^{a_1})p^2 \\S(ip)=S(i)p^2S(n)=d∣l∑​μ(d)(dl​)2S(1)=1,S(p)=p2−1,S(pk)=p2k−2(p2−1)if(i%p==0),S(ip)=S(i)S(p)if(i%p!=0),S(ip)=S(i/pa1​)S(pa1​+1),S(i)=S(i/pa1​)S(pa1​)S(pa1​+1)=p2(a1​+1)−2(p2−1)=[p2a1​−2(p2−1)]p2=S(pa1​)p2S(ip)=S(i)p2

代码
